metadata.inclusion:
Start inclusion, per instructions on the existing network controller.
In the UI, press the learn button.
When prompted, enter the 5 digit underlined portion of the DSK code.
Verify secure inclusion completed successfully on the existing network controller per that documentation
metadata.exclusion:
Start exclusion, per instructions on the existing network controller.
In the UI, press the learn button.
Verify exclusion completed successfully on the existing network controller per that documentation
metadata.reset: In the UI, press Hard Reset.
